faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to the most common questions about our services

q1.question: What services does Phoenix Finance provide?
q1.answer: We offer full-cycle accounting, tax planning and filing, financial reporting, business registration in Georgia, payroll management, audit services, and international tax planning. Whether you're a startup or an established company, we tailor our services to your needs.

q2.question: How quickly can you set up accounting for my business?
q2.answer: For most businesses, we can have your accounting fully set up within 3–5 business days. This includes configuring your reporting structure, tax framework, and assigning a dedicated personal manager.

q3.question: What documents do I need to get started?
q3.answer: Typically, we need your company registration documents, tax ID, bank account details, and any existing financial records. Don't worry — we'll provide a complete checklist and guide you through the process.

q4.question: Is the initial consultation really free?
q4.answer: Yes, absolutely. The first consultation is completely free with no obligations. We'll assess your situation, answer your questions, and recommend the best approach for your business.

q5.question: Do you work with foreign companies registered in Georgia?
q5.answer: Yes, this is one of our core strengths. We have extensive experience with international businesses, cross-border taxation, and foreign legal entities operating in Georgia.

q6.question: How much do your services cost?
q6.answer: Our pricing depends on your business size and the scope of services you need. We offer flexible packages starting from basic bookkeeping to full financial management. Contact us for a personalized quote.
